alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 2:05AM EDT until April 09 at 4:10AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sacandaga River At Hope. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. There are two to three feet of water on nearby roads and properties. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:46 AM EDT Friday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:46 AM EDT Friday was 8.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.5 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 7 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.5 feet on 04/01/1976. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Sacandaga River Hope Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Fri 1 am: 8.5 Forecast: Fri 8 am 9.5 Fri 2 pm 8.7 Fri 8 pm 7.4 Sat 2 am 6.3 Sat 8 am 5.9 Sat 2 pm 5.7 Sat 8 pm 5.5 Sun 2 am 5.3 Sun 8 am 5.0 Sun 2 pm 4.8 Sun 8 pm 4.7 &&
